InvoiceForm.title: Invoice Split Calculator
InvoiceForm.description_p1: Easily allocate multi-year invoice totals across individual fiscal years or specific accounting periods. This tool provides accurate, proportional calculations based on start and end dates, simplifying compliance with accrual principles.
InvoiceForm.description_p2: Ideal for accountants preparing income statements and balance sheets, financial professionals managing budgets, or anyone needing a clear financial breakdown for reporting.
InvoiceForm.includeEndDateDescription: Specifies if the end date counts as part of the period.
InvoiceForm.includeEndDateTooltip: If checked, the end date is included in the allocation period (+1 day). Example: Jan 1 to Jan 3 (inclusive) = 3 days.
InvoiceForm.amountsDescription: Enter one or more amounts to allocate.
InvoiceForm.errorEndDateBeforeStart: End date must be on or after start date.
InvoiceForm.errorAmountRequired: Please enter at least one amount.
InvoiceForm.errorAmountPositive: Amount must be a positive number.

ResultsDisplay.roundingNote: Note: Totals may vary slightly due to rounding.
ResultsDisplay.errorNoSplits: Calculation complete, but no allocation results generated.

Errors.unexpectedError: An unexpected error occurred during the calculation.
